forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
